mapper.select: SELECT chat_id, cust_id, stu_id, word, file_path, DATE_FORMAT(date_time, "%Y/%c/%e %r") date_time, sender, read_check FROM chat WHERE cust_id=#{custId} AND stu_id=#{stuId};

SELECT chat_id, cust_id, stu_id, word, file_path, DATE_FORMAT(date_time, "%Y/%c/%e %r") date_time, sender, read_check FROM chat WHERE cust_id=#{custId} AND stu_id=#{stuId} ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT comId, comName, comLogo, cs.stuId, stuName, custId, custName, custLogo, chatId, word, filePath, DATE_FORMAT(dateTime, "%Y/%c/%e %r") dateTime, sender, readCheck FROM (SELECT c.com_id comId, c.name comName, c.logo_img comLogo, s.stu_id stuId, s.name stuName FROM company c, studio s WHERE c.com_id=#{comId} AND c.com_id = s.com_id) cs, (SELECT cu.cust_id custId, cu.nickname custName, cu.img_src custLogo, ch.chat_id chatId, ch.stu_id stuId, ch.word word, ch.file_path filePath, ch.date_time dateTime, ch.sender sender, ch.read_check readCheck FROM (SELECT * FROM customer) cu, (SELECT * FROM chat WHERE date_time IN (SELECT MAX(date_time) FROM chat GROUP BY cust_id, stu_id)) ch WHERE cu.cust_id=ch.cust_id) cuh WHERE cs.stuId = cuh.stuId ORDER BY cuh.dateTime DESC;

SELECT cu.cust_id custId, cu.nickname custName, cu.img_src custLogo, st.stu_id stuId, st.name stuName, ch.chat_id chatId, ch.word word, ch.file_path, ch.date_time dateTime, ch.sender sender, ch.read_check FROM (SELECT * FROM customer) cu, (SELECT * FROM studio) st, (SELECT * FROM chat WHERE date_time IN (SELECT MAX(date_time) FROM chat WHERE stu_id = #{stuId} GROUP BY cust_id)) ch WHERE ch.stu_id = st.stu_id AND ch.cust_id = cu.cust_id ORDER BY dateTime DESC;
